author: Sarah Chen, CTO at TechForward
content: Excited to announce that we've just open-sourced our internal framework for building scalable microservices! After using it internally for 2 years and seeing a 40% reduction in development time, we decided it's time to share with the community. Check it out at github.com/techforward/serviceframe and let me know what you think! #OpenSource #Microservices #SoftwareEngineering
